EmailTemplate.description: Reset your password for IATA ISSP Portal
EmailTemplate.name: Identity_Changed_ISSP_Password_Email_Custom
EmailTemplate.subject: Reset your password for IATA Customer Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!$Label.ISSP_Email_do_not_reply} {!Community_Name}
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Receiving_User.FirstName} {!Receiving_User.LastName},
Your password has been reset for {!Community_Name}.
Click {!$Label.ISSP_Email_Here} and then proceed to set up your own password.
Thank you for resetting your password.
IATA Customer Service
